message_1: In a rail fence cipher, if the plaintext "Hello World" is encrypted using three rails, what would the encrypted message look like?
message_2:
In a rail fence cipher with three rails, the plaintext "Hello World" would be written in a zigzag pattern as follows:

H . . . o . . . l
. e . l . W . r .
. . l . . . o . .

Reading the characters in each row from left to right, the encrypted message would be: "HolelWrllo".
